title: 11-year-old injured in Aiken shooting
content:
An 11-year-old child was injured and transported to an area hospital after a shooting that occurred Monday afternoon, according to the Aiken County Sheriff’s Office.
The incident happened on Nautilus Street in Aiken at about 3:30 p.m. The child’s condition is unknown at this time.
The shooting was apparently an accident involving a 19-year-old male, according to scanner traffic.
Details were limited before press time. The Aiken Standard will have more on this story as it develops.
